primary_rule.text: Areas higher than 17' and 26' above the first floor (that do not already count as floor area e.g., open atrium spaces and inaccessible attic spaces), count toward the gross floor area in the form of 2nd and 3rd floor equivalency regardless of the floor plan or usage of the space. Stairwells will be measured the same way that vaulted ceiling spaces are measured.

qualifiers.scope: Areas higher than 17' and 26' above the first floor
qualifiers.applicability: Spaces that do not already count as floor area
qualifiers.exclusions: Open atrium spaces and inaccessible attic spaces

variables.usage_parameters: Regardless of the floor plan or usage of the space

constants.specs: Stairwells measured the same way as vaulted ceiling spaces

conditions.mandatory: Areas higher than 17' and 26' count toward gross floor area

exceptions.text: 200 sf of 3rd floor equivalency may be exempted where roof pitch is 4:12 or steeper

figure.caption: Figure 12 2nd & 3rd floor equivalency
callouts_and_labels: 1st flr (left figure label at first floor)
1st fl (right figure label at first floor)
Vaulted ceiling space (appears over Area B in right figure)
Width of area that counts as 3rd floor equivalency
Width of area that counts as 2nd floor equivalency
Width of area that counts as 2nd floor (baseline width noted along the first level)
